description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0530 ( Organization, Agency, Department)
name: v2 Organization, Agency, Department

text.div:
Organization, Agency, Department

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
AE American Expressadded v2.5
DEA Drug Enforcement AgencyThe US Drug Enforcement Administration does not solely assign DEA numbers in the United States. Hospitals have the authority to issue DEA numbers to their medical residents. These DEA numbers are based upon the hospital's DEA number, but the authority resadded v2.5
DOD Department of DefenseIn some countries e.g. the US, more than one department may issue a military identifier. Hence, US is not sufficient as the Assigning Authority.added v2.5
MC Master Cardadded v2.5
VA Veterans Affairsadded v2.5
VI Visaadded v2.5
